title: rAmuni nammina
sahitya:
rAmuni nammina janulaku bhayamEmi rAjyamElEru vaikuNThamu kollapeTTEru


anupallavi

  sAmAnyuDu gADu sArvabhaumuDu shrI mAninI manOharuDu caturdasha bhuvanAdhIsuDu sarasuDu


caraNam    surula munula vairulake venuka narAdi rUpamulanu dAlci paramAtmuDADina lIlalanu
delpanADu sadAshiva kavi bAdhalanu dIrpacAlaDA dInadayAparuDu gADA
